sentences.literal: Tu Wei Shetige Yuan Feng first year.

sentences.chinese: 十二大餘五，小餘三十一；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder five, small remainder thirty one;
Large remainder eleven, small remainder eight;
Zhu Li Shan E second year.

sentences.chinese: 十二大餘五十九，小餘三百七十九；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder fifty nine, small remainder three hundred seventy nine;
Large remainder sixteen, small remainder sixteen;
Shang Heng Zhi Xu third year.

sentences.chinese: 閏十三大餘五十三，小餘七百二十七；
sentences.literal: Intercalary thirteen large remainder fifty three, small remainder seven hundred twenty seven;

sentences.chinese: 大餘二十一，小餘二十四；
sentences.literal: Large remainder twenty one, small remainder twenty four;
Zhao Yang Da Huang Luo fourth year.

sentences.chinese: 十二大餘十七，小餘六百三十四；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder seventeen, small remainder six hundred thirty four;
Large remainder twenty seven, no small remainder;
Heng Ai Dun Zang fifth year.

sentences.chinese: 閏十三大餘十二，小餘四十二；
sentences.literal: Intercalary thirteen large remainder twelve, small remainder forty two;
Large remainder thirty two, small remainder eight;
